fields.headline: Whitney Houston files for divorce
fields.bodyText: Whitney Houston has filed for divorce from her musician husband, Bobby Brown, her publicist revealed yesterday. Houston, 43, and Brown, 37, who wed in 1992, have had a tumultuous marriage. They live in Alpharetta, Georgia, and have one daughter, 13. Houston had her greatest musical success in the 80s and 90s, including the hit I Will Always Love You, but in recent years has battled drug problems. Brown has a history of drug and alcohol arrests and was sentenced to 90 days in jail in 2004 for missing three months of child support payments for two other children.
